snippet: James Moses, a renowned handler of German shepherds, acknowledged his close ties to many competitors but said his critics were “crybabies.”
abstract: James Moses, renowned handler of German shepherds, will take center stage as judge at Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show; he is connected with many of owners and handlers of dogs who have qualified to show in front of him this year, which critics see as conflict of interest.

byline.original: By SUSANNE CRAIG and MARY PILON

lead_paragraph: James Moses, a renowned handler of German shepherds, acknowledged his close ties to many competitors but said his critics were “crybabies.”

headline.seo: Judge for Westminster Dog Show Dismisses Doubts About Fairness
headline.main: Judge for Westminster Dog Show Dismisses Doubts About Fairness
headline.print_headline: Linked to Competitors, Judge Asserts Integrity
